channel.title: Just wondering where to post this
channel.description: Well the new game the T&S Game Creations and I have been developing is finally up and running. Its beta mode of course but still really fun. Well its a COD type game so far it has one game mode, FFA (Free For All), but is a work in progress. To get to the point the team and I decided that we would release the full project so that others can make their own private server/clients. We were just going to post this in the General Programming section, but were wondering if we could post it in the Server Downloads Section. The source is completely detailed and explains every bit of code to help those that dont understand programming very well.

item.title: Just wondering where to post this

item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Still goes in the General Programming though.

Read full topic

item.title: Just wondering where to post this
item.dc:creator: @GML_Programmer GML Programmer
item.description:
@GML_Programmer wrote:

Its ok. I dont (well me and my team) mind where I post it. Or if people leech. It just means that we had something good enough to leech lol. Besides by the time were finished it is going to be way different than what anybody else could.

Read full topic
